mdRecord.dcterms:title: Original Bond's Store at Falcon
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Original Bonds Store. Left to Right: Fannie Slusher (Jones) holding horse reins, unidentified person with Chloa Hylton on the horse, Edwin Hylton (young boy), Lather Hylton, Addie Harman (Sumpter), and Russell Harman in buggy.
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
